item.description:
Boston Asian American Film Festival Karen Tei Yamashita, author of I Hotel and 2010 National Book Award Finalist, will be giving an author talk at the Boston Chinatown Neighborhood Center (BCNC) on Sunday, March 13 at 2pm. Come learn about how the International Hotel in San Francisco became the center of the Asian American civil rights movement in the 60's. The event is free and open to the public. May want to call to reserve a space.

38 Ash St. at Washington St. Boston, MA 02111 USA Phone: 617-635-5129

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Author Talk: Karen Tei Yamashita
